products.name: Tomato ketchup, tomato
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Tomato Ketchup, Groceries
products.facts: ["Tomato ketchup is primarily made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and spices.","The production of tomato ketchup can contribute to agricultural practices that promote biodiversity when sourced from sustainable farms.","Quality tomato ketchup is often made from ripe, fresh tomatoes to ensure optimal flavor and nutritional content.","Many tomato ketchup brands are now using glass bottles or recyclable packaging to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Pulp Free Orange Juice
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Carbonated drinks, Fruit-based beverages, Juices and nectars, Fruit juices, Carbonated fruit soft drink, Orange juices, Carbonated fruit soft drinks with sugar with 10-50% of fruit juice, Juice
products.facts: ["Pulp free orange juice is made from 100% pure orange juice with no added pulp.","The packaging for 11.5 oz pulp free orange juice is often made from recyclable materials, reducing ecological impact.","Pulp free orange juice typically contains no preservatives or artificial flavors, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Many brands source their oranges from sustainable farms, promoting ecological responsibility in juice production."]

products.name: Salted Butter
products.categories: Dairies, Fats, Spreads, Spreadable fats, Animal fats, Milkfat, Dairy spread, Butters, Salted butters, en:sweet-cream-butters
products.facts: ["Made from cream, salt, and sometimes cultures for flavor enhancement.","Typically produced from milk sourced from local dairy farms, supporting regional agriculture.","Salt acts as a preservative, extending shelf life and enhancing flavor without the need for artificial additives.","Quality butter is often graded based on fat content, with higher fat percentages indicating richer flavor and better baking properties."]

products.name: Vanilla bean plant based protein powder
products.labels: No gluten, Organic, Vegetarian, EU Organic, USDA Organic, Vegan, AB Agriculture Biologique
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality plant-based sources such as peas and brown rice.","Non-GMO and free from artificial flavors and preservatives.","Sustainably sourced ingredients to minimize environmental impact.","Rich in essential amino acids, promoting muscle recovery and growth."]

products.name: Blueberry Greek Yogurt
products.categories: Dairies,Fermented foods,Fermented milk products,Desserts,Dairy desserts,Fermented dairy desserts,Yogurts,Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Contains natural blueberries as a primary ingredient.","Made with high-quality Greek yogurt, which is strained for a thicker texture.","Often packaged in recyclable materials to reduce ecological impact.","Rich in protein and probiotics, contributing to gut health."]

products.name: Cadbury dairy milk chocolate bar
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Chocolates, Milk chocolates, en:chocolate-candies
products.facts: ["Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate bars are made from a combination of milk chocolate, cocoa solids, sugar, and milk powder.","The cocoa used in Cadbury Dairy Milk is sourced from sustainable farms, promoting responsible farming practices.","Cadbury is committed to reducing its environmental impact by using recyclable packaging for its chocolate bars.","The quality of Cadbury Dairy Milk is maintained through rigorous testing and adherence to high manufacturing standards."]

products.name: Gouda  jeune en tranches
products.facts: ["Gouda jeune en tranches is made from pasteurized cow's milk.","The cheese is typically aged for 4 to 6 months, giving it a mild flavor.","Gouda production often follows sustainable practices, reducing environmental impact.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness."]

products.name: Thumbs Up 750ml
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Sodas, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["Thumbs Up 750ml is packaged in a recyclable PET plastic bottle.","The beverage is produced using high-quality ingredients to ensure a refreshing taste.","Thumbs Up promotes sustainability by encouraging recycling of its packaging materials.","The product is manufactured in compliance with strict quality control standards to ensure safety and consistency."]

products.name: Lemon Blueberry Superfood Oat Bites
products.facts: ["Made with organic oats and real blueberries for a nutritious snack.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring high-quality ingredients.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Rich in fiber and antioxidants, promoting overall health and wellness."]

products.name: Vegan Caramel Sea Salt
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Chocolates
products.labels: Vegetarian, Vegan, European Vegetarian Union, European Vegetarian Union Vegan, Green Dot
products.facts: ["Made with organic coconut sugar for a healthier sweetener option.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no animal products, making it suitable for vegan diets.","Crafted with high-quality natural ingredients to ensure rich flavor and texture."]

products.name: Macédoine de légumes
products.ingredients_text: Eau, carottes, haricots verts, navets, petits pois, flageolets verts, sel.
products.facts: ["Made from a mix of fresh, seasonal vegetables such as carrots, peas, and green beans.","Packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","No artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring a high-quality product.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance."]
